original_text: Jesus travelled on from that place and he walked along the shore of Lake Galilee. He climbed up a hill and he sat down there.
korean_text: 예수께서 거기서 떠나사 갈릴리 호숫가에 이르러 산에 올라가 거기 앉으시니

sentences.original_text: Jesus travelled on from that place
and he walked along the shore of Lake Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 갈릴리 호수 해안을 따라 걸으셨습니다
